attributes.action: Recognise Gina Miller for her services to democracy by making her a Dame.
attributes.background: Following attempts by the government to circumvent the role of Parliament in approving the triggering of Article 50, Gina Miller led the fight all the way to the Supreme Court to force the government to seek parliamentary approval despite inappropriate personal attacks.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
